message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is invaluable to you. Given its significance and the value it holds for you, I understand its worth to be $1,500,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true value and ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and aligns with your financial planning. I am confident that this product will bring immense value to you and look forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice
